text: Vony skazaly, "Tse - domashna khudoba ta zerno shcho zaboronyayut聞sya; niyakyy kozhnyy ne bude z'yisty yikh krim whomever my dozvolyayemo," takym chynom vony zayavyly. Vony takozh zaboronyly zvil聞nyayuchoyi vid pevnoyi domashnoyi khudoby. Navit聞 domashna khudoba vony hostylysya, vony nikoly ne promovyly BOZHU nazvu tomu shcho vony pozhertvuvaly nymy. Takyy novovvedennya prypysani Yomu. Vin bude bezsumnivno requite yim dlya yikhnikh novovveden聞
